title: Authors and Citation
text: Kaye E (2024). aochelpers: Companion Advent Code Associated Personal Website. R package version 0.1.0.9000,  https://ellakaye.github.io/aochelpers/, https://github.com/EllaKaye/aochelpers.
code: @Manual{,   title = {aochelpers: Companion to Advent of Code and Associated Personal Website},   author = {Ella Kaye},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0.9000,  https://ellakaye.github.io/aochelpers/},   url = {https://github.com/EllaKaye/aochelpers}, }

what: Companion to Advent of Code and Associated Personal Website
title: Companion to Advent of Code and Associated Personal Website
text: aochelpers companion package Advent Code website template: https://github.com/EllaKaye/advent--code-website-template/. contains functions create new listings posts corresponding years days Advent Code challenges. also contains functions download save puzzle input Advent Code website, read R variety formats. time, add functions useful solving puzzles. functions designed used conjunction Advent Code website template, easier demonstrate context , see repo https://github.com/EllaKaye/advent--code-website-template/ corresponding demo site, https://ellakaye.github.io/advent--code-website-template/, documentation example.

title: Companion to Advent of Code and Associated Personal Website
text: can install development version aochelpers GitHub :

title: Companion to Advent of Code and Associated Personal Website
text: main functions aochelpers aoc_new_year() aoc_new_day(). copy files website’s "_template" directory, paste appropriate location website directory. Moreover, copies, replace instances YYYY DD templates values year day arguments, respectively, directory file names, contents .qmd files . descriptions , YYYY DD placeholders used indicate year day values inserted. aoc_new_year() create new directory specified year, ./YYYY/. create new listing page year, ./YYYY.qmd. listing page created using template ./_templates/YYYY.qmd. listing page picks posts YYYY/day directory. (directory structure echoes structure Advent Code website.) optionally create introductory post year, ./YYYY/day/YYYY-introduction, using template ./_templates/YYYY-intro. post created intro argument TRUE (default). Note , Quarto v1.4, needs least one post YYYY/day directory website render without error. _templates/_metadata.yml exists, copied ./YYYY/day/_metadata.yml. aoc_new_day() create new directory specified day, ./YYYY/day/DD/ copy contents _templates/post-template directory download puzzle input day Advent Code website, save ./YYYY/day/DD/input See advent--code-website-template repo details default contents _templates. functions creating deleting directories files based advent--code-website-template. See Reference page details.
code: library(aochelpers) # Add a listing page a directory for a new year aoc_new_year() # current year  aoc_new_year(2022) # specified year  # Add a post for a new day aoc_new_day(1) # day 1 of current year aoc_new_day(2, 2022) # day 2 of specified year

title: Companion to Advent of Code and Associated Personal Website
text: aochelpers provides number functions read puzzle input, saved Advent Code website. functions designed used conjunction Advent Code website template, see output functions, see repo https://github.com/EllaKaye/advent--code-website-template/ corresponding site, https://ellakaye.github.io/advent--code-website-template/, examples output.

text: year integer representing year, 2015 current year. Defaults current year.

what: Delete the directory for a day or year — aoc_delete_day
title: Delete the directory for a day or year — aoc_delete_day
text: Assumes directory year relative path "./YYYY" directory day relative path "./YYYY/day/DD", YYYY DD values year day. case post created using aoc_new_day(). directory day year corresponding directory "./_freeze", also deleted. Additionally, aoc_delete_year(), listing page ./YYYY.qmd (YYYY value year) deleted.

title: Delete the directory for a day or year — aoc_delete_day
Delete the directory for a day or year — aoc_delete_day
text: day integer 1 25 year integer representing year, 2015 current year. Defaults current year.

title: Delete the directory for a day or year — aoc_delete_day
text: path day deleted (invisibly)

title: Delete the directory for a day or year — aoc_delete_day

what: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
title: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
text: Get puzzle input Advent Code website given day year save file. file saved current working directory relative path "./YYYY/day/DD/input", YYYY value year parameter DD value day parameter. path echoes URL structure Advent Code website.

title: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
text: day integer 1 25 year integer representing year, 2015 current year. Defaults current year.

title: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
text: Returns, invisibly, character string absolute path input file.

title: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
text: function assumes account Advent Code website. function work, must set ADVENT_SESSION environment variable .Renviron file. guidance find session token, see https://github.com/dgrtwo/adventdrob/tree/main#installation. session token, can set environment variable usethis::edit_r_environ(). function adapted https://github.com/dgrtwo/adventdrob/blob/main/R/input.R, saves input file instead returning data frame. input saved, can read aoc_input_vector(), aoc_input_data_frame() aoc_input_matrix(), whichever appropriate puzzle. function also called part aoc_new_day().

title: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input

what: Read puzzle input as a data frame — aoc_input_data_frame
title: Read puzzle input as a data frame — aoc_input_data_frame
text: Read puzzle input, file, data frame, one row per line. assumes file stored directory "./YYYY/day/DD", YYYY DD values year day. default, file name "input". file exist location post created using aoc_new_day(). class tbl_df, reading done readr::read_table(). class data.frame, reading done utils::read.table(). defaults chosen suit typical Advent Code puzzle input.

title: Read puzzle input as a data frame — aoc_input_data_frame
code: aoc_input_data_frame(   day,   year = NULL,   file = "input",   class = c("tbl_df", "data.frame"),   col_names = FALSE,   show_col_types = FALSE,   view = FALSE )

title: Read puzzle input as a data frame — aoc_input_data_frame
text: day integer 1 25 year integer representing year, 2015 current year. Defaults current year. file Character string. name file exists directory "./YYYY/day/DD", YYYY DD values year day. Defaults "input". class character. One 'tbl_df' 'data.frame'. Default 'tbl_df'. col_names logical. relevant class tbl_df. TRUE, first row input file used column names. Default FALSE show_col_types logical. TRUE, column types shown. Default FALSE view logical. TRUE, calls utils::View() view returned input. Default FALSE

title: Read puzzle input as a data frame — aoc_input_data_frame
text: data frame containing puzzle input day year.

title: Read puzzle input as a data frame — aoc_input_data_frame

what: Read puzzle input as a matrix — aoc_input_matrix
title: Read puzzle input as a matrix — aoc_input_matrix
text: Read puzzle input, file, matrix, one row per line, default one character per column. assumes file stored directory "./YYYY/day/DD", YYYY DD values year day. default, file name "input". file exist location post created using aoc_new_day(). initial reading done readLines().

title: Read puzzle input as a matrix — aoc_input_matrix
code: aoc_input_matrix(   day,   year = NULL,   file = "input",   mode = c("character", "numeric"),   split = "",   view = FALSE )

title: Read puzzle input as a matrix — aoc_input_matrix
text: day integer 1 25 year integer representing year, 2015 current year. Defaults current year. file Character string. name file exists directory "./YYYY/day/DD", YYYY DD values year day. Defaults "input". mode Character string. One 'character' 'numeric'. Default 'character'. split character. string split input . Default "", .e. one character per column view logical. TRUE, calls utils::View() view returned input. Default FALSE

title: Read puzzle input as a matrix — aoc_input_matrix
text: matrix containing puzzle input day year.

title: Read puzzle input as a matrix — aoc_input_matrix

what: Read puzzle input as a vector — aoc_input_vector
title: Read puzzle input as a vector — aoc_input_vector
text: Read puzzle input, file, vector, one element per line. assumes file stored directory "./YYYY/day/DD", YYYY DD values year day. default, file name "input". file exist location post created using aoc_new_day(). reading done readLines().

title: Read puzzle input as a vector — aoc_input_vector
code: aoc_input_vector(   day,   year = NULL,   file = "input",   mode = c("character", "numeric") )

title: Read puzzle input as a vector — aoc_input_vector
text: day integer 1 25 year integer representing year, 2015 current year. Defaults current year. file Character string. name file exists directory "./YYYY/day/DD", YYYY DD values year day. Defaults "input". mode Character string. One 'character' 'numeric'. Default 'character'.

title: Read puzzle input as a vector — aoc_input_vector
text: vector containing puzzle input day year.

what: Set up a new day — aoc_new_day
title: Set up a new day — aoc_new_day
text: Create necessary directories new post, copy template files make relevant day year (see Details).

title: Set up a new day — aoc_new_day
code: aoc_new_day(day, year = NULL)  aoc_new_post(day, year = NULL)

title: Set up a new day — aoc_new_day
text: day integer 1 25 year integer representing year, 2015 current year. Defaults current year.

title: Set up a new day — aoc_new_day
text: path new day (invisibly)

title: Set up a new day — aoc_new_day
text: aoc_new_post() aoc_new_day() assume called project directory _templates, subdirectory post-template contains, minimum, file index.qmd. copy files post-template directory "./YYYY/day/DD" YYYY value year parameter DD value day parameter (creating directories already exist). path echoes URL structure Advent Code website. Additionally, replace instances YYYY DD index.qmd (present) script.R files values year day parameters, respectively. addition, aoc_new_day() also run aoc_get_input() download puzzle input save post directory. Advent Code session token set .Renviron file, recommend using aoc_new_day() aoc_new_post(). wish download save puzzle input separately, use aoc_new_post().

title: Set up a new day — aoc_new_day

text: Create introduction post relative path ./YYYY/day/introduction (YYYY value year) copying template ./_templates/YYYY-intro substituting YYYY value year, new file name file .

title: Create an introduction post — aoc_new_intro

what: Create directory and files for a new year — aoc_new_year
title: Create directory and files for a new year — aoc_new_year
text: Creates directory relative path ./YYYY (YYYY value year) copies listing template "./_templates/YYYY.qmd" YYYY.qmd , latter, replaces YYYY value year, file name file . Additionally, introduction post _metadata.yml may created. See Details information.

title: Create directory and files for a new year — aoc_new_year
Create directory and files for a new year — aoc_new_year
text: year integer representing year, 2015 current year. Defaults current year. intro Logical. Whether include introduction post.

title: Create directory and files for a new year — aoc_new_year
text: path new year directory (invisibly)

title: Create directory and files for a new year — aoc_new_year
text: listing page, ./YYYY.qmd (YYYY value year) picks posts subdirectory ./YYYY/day (echoes URL structure Advent Code website). Note website fail render posts day directory. avoid problem, default introduction post introduction created, assuming directory ./_templates/YYYY-intro exists (website template https://github.com/EllaKaye/advent--code-website-template.) want introduction post, set intro = FALSE. introduction post can also created separately aoc_new_intro() deleted aoc_delete_intro(). Without introduction post, note need least one post, e.g. call aoc_new_day() rendering website. Additionally, file ./_templates/_metadata.yml, copied ./YYYY/day/_metadata.yml. file used set metadata posts day directory. intro post _metadata.yml file, "./YYYY" directory created, subdirectory ./YYYY/day. latter created first call aoc_new_day() year. case, website render call aoc_new_year().

title: Create directory and files for a new year — aoc_new_year

title: Split input into groups — split_at_blanks
aochelpers 0.1.0.9000
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Use readr::read_table() instead readr::read_delim() aoc_input_data_frame() Add user agent aoc_get_input() Add extract_numbers() extract numbers string Add GCD() LCM() finding greatest common divisor lowest common multiple Add lines_to_matrix() convert vector strings matrix Add split_at_blanks() create list input, one element per group originally separated blank lines Update aoc_input_vector() aoc_input_matrix() use readLines() Add file argument aoc_input_vector(), aoc_input_data_frame() aoc_input_matrix() read file directory given day year. Add aoc_new_conclusion() aoc_delete_conclusion() functions create delete conclusion posts.
